# MAM with Doc URLs

## What is MAM with Doc?

"MAM with doc" is a web-based viewer for the MAM (Miqra According to the Masorah) Hebrew Bible text hosted on GitHub Pages. It shows fully pointed Hebrew text with documentation annotations.

## Base URL

```
https://bdenckla.github.io/MAM-with-doc/
```

## Book Codes

Each book has a two-character prefix code followed by a hyphen and the book name:

| Code | Book | Code | Book |
|------|------|------|------|
| A1 | Genesis | A2 | Exodus |
| A3 | Levit | A4 | Numbers |
| A5 | Deuter | | |
| B1 | Joshua | B2 | Judges |
| BA | 1Samuel | BB | 2Samuel |
| BC | 1Kings | BD | 2Kings |
| C1 | Isaiah | C2 | Jeremiah |
| C3 | Ezekiel | CA | Hosea |
| CB | Joel | CC | Amos |
| CD | Obadiah | CE | Jonah |
| CF | Micah | CG | Nahum |
| CH | Habakkuk | CI | Zephaniah |
| CJ | Haggai | CK | Zechariah |
| CL | Malachi | | |
| D1 | Psalms | D2 | Proverbs |
| D3 | Job | | |
| E1 | Song of Songs | E2 | Ruth |
| E3 | Lamentations | E4 | Ecclesiastes |
| E5 | Esther | | |
| F1 | Daniel | FA | Ezra |
| FB | Nehemiah | FC | 1Chronicles |
| FD | 2Chronicles | | |

## Verse Fragment

To link to a specific verse, append `#c<chapter>v<verse>`:

```
#c150v1   → chapter 150, verse 1
#c3v16    → chapter 3, verse 16
```

## Full URL Examples

```
https://bdenckla.github.io/MAM-with-doc/D1-Psalms.html#c150v1
https://bdenckla.github.io/MAM-with-doc/D3-Job.html#c1v19
https://bdenckla.github.io/MAM-with-doc/D2-Proverbs.html#c1v1
https://bdenckla.github.io/MAM-with-doc/BA-1Samuel.html#c12v10
```

## Usage

To open a specific verse in the browser:

```powershell
Start-Process "https://bdenckla.github.io/MAM-with-doc/D3-Job.html#c38v31"
```

Or use the VS Code simple browser for inline viewing.
